GSD.product_version: versions from v4.17 to before v5.4.221
GSD.description:
tipc: fix an information leak in tipc_topsrv_kern_subscr

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.221 by commit 567f8de358b61015dcfb8878a1f06c5369a45f54, it was introduced in version v4.17 by commit 026321c6d056a54b4145522492245d2b5913ee1d. For more details please see the references link.
